name: Dots and Boxes - Squares
description:
The classic Dots and Boxes game to remember childhood. Also known as Paddocks, Square-it, Dashes, Dots, Smart Dots, Dot Boxing, or Dot Game

HOW TO PLAY
The goal in the Dots and Boxes game is to always close the square. At each round, a player chooses where to draw a line between two adjacent points. The player scores a point when he closes a square, in which case he continues to play.

OBJECTIVE
Be the player who closes the largest number of squares.

FEATURES
In the game of dots you can challenge the computer, or you can play against your friends!
This game contains single and multiplayer. Beautiful design to please children.
